security.tls.v1_server.description: Verify the device supports at least TLS 1.0 (as a server)

security.tls.v1_2_server.description: Verify the device supports TLS 1.2 (as a server)

security.tls.v1_3_server.description: Verify the device supports TLS 1.3 (as a server)

security.tls.v1_2_client.description: Verify the device supports at least TLS 1.2 (as a client)

security.tls.v1_3_client.description: Verify the device supports at least TLS 1.3 (as a client)
